DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Prior Other Anatomic Site Administered Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator for prior radiation therapy administered to area of the body generally construed to comprise base of skull and facial bones, sinuses, orbits, salivary glands, oral cavity, oropharynx, larynx, thyroid, facial and neck musculature and lymph nodes draining these areas.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Prior Other Anatomic Site Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to prior radiation therapy, the use of high-energy radiation from x-rays, gamma rays, neutrons, and other sources to kill cancer cells and shrink tumors, to the area of the body different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Not otherwise specified.:Named locations of, or within, the body.:Given.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Named locations of or within the body.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Prior Radiation Therapy to ot
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior Radiation Therapy to other sites

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive the last dose of any focal irradiation more than 6 weeks prior to study enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive the last dose of any focal irradiation more than 42 days prior to study enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive the last dose of focal irradiation more than 14 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive the last dose of any focal irradiation more than 14 days prior to study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive the last dose of any focal irradiation > 4 weeks prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive the last dose of any focal irradiation >= 14 days prior to study enrollment?
